body_html:
It doesn't look for a GPU, it only checks if it's installed somewhere. We'll have to figure out a way of forcing CUDA detection in THPP to be off when --with-cuda isn't specified.

Why is it buggy? You probably have it in a non standard directory. Where is it installed? Do you have all the headers and libs in /usr?

It doesn't look for a GPU, it only checks if it's installed somewhere. We'll have to figure out a way of forcing CUDA detection in THPP to be off when `--with-cuda` isn't specified.

Why is it buggy? You probably have it in a non standard directory. Where is it installed? Do you have all the headers and libs in /usr?
